document_data.name: Andrus Kriivor
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|4}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 3: The Bron's Deputies}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Andrus Kriivor''' was a law enforcement officer in the town of [[Voonlar]] sometime during the term of Bron [[Buorstag Hlammythyl]], ''i.e.'', from about [[1355 DR]] until at least [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was a competent leader, able to keep his head and make tactical decisions in crisis situations.
document_data.Abilities: Andrus was a specialist with the longsword.
document_data.Possessions: He wore [[chain mail]] and carried a [[shield]],{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|3}}
document_data.History: Andrus was trained by the [[Zhentilar]] and chosen for the position of deputy.
